title: Competitive Price Intelligence-Web Scraping

subtitle: Rotating proxies & UA spoofing to harvest IMDb at scale
challenge: The pricing team lacked real-time visibility into competitor prices and promotions, leading to delayed adjustments in our offering and missed sales opportunities.
solution: We rolled out an automated competitor pricing intelligence platform that delivers daily market insights and actionable recommendations through an intuitive dashboard, empowering the pricing team to adjust prices in real time, respond swiftly to competitor promotions, and maximize revenue without manual effort.
results: +150,000 USD incremental revenue in the first quarter post-implementation
−80% reduction in manual price monitoring time (from 40 h/week to 8 h/week)
100% daily coverage of key competitor prices

title: Disbursement API – Instant Fund Release
shortDesc: RESTful API enabled $16 M monthly disbursement volume with 99.9% uptime.
subtitle: High-availability disbursement API for seamless credit funding
challenge: Manual fund-release processes caused delays up to 48 hours, high operational costs, and customer dissatisfaction.
solution: We built a scalable RESTful Disbursement API that automates end-to-end fund transfers upon credit approval, offering real-time processing, status callbacks, and full audit trails.
overview: This microservice handles secure, idempotent fund disbursements via REST endpoints, with real-time tracking and SLA-backed availability.
features: Scalable RESTful endpoints for instant payouts
applications: Integration with banking rails (ACH, SEPA, RTP)

title: AI-Powered Approval Engine – Fraud Reduction
shortDesc: Machine-learning engine cut fraud by 50% and boosted approval rates by 25%.
subtitle: Smart validation engine for risk-aware credit decisions
challenge: Rule-based approvals generated high false-positive rates and missed complex fraud patterns, resulting in revenue leakage and compliance risks.
solution: We developed an AI-driven Approval Engine using anomaly detection and pattern recognition to score applications in milliseconds, enabling dynamic risk thresholds and continuous model retraining.
results: processing time low amount (6 d → under 1 m)
processing time manually (6 h → under 24 h)
overview: This service processes credit applications with real-time AI scoring, balancing risk tolerance with conversion targets and providing explainable decision logs.

title: Secure Authenticator Service – OAuth2 & MFA
shortDesc: OAuth2 & MFA service achieved 99.5% success rate and 30% reduction in login friction.
subtitle: Robust user authentication with multi-factor security
challenge: Basic username/password flows led to login failures, high support load, and security vulnerabilities.
solution: We implemented an OAuth2-based Authenticator Service with built-in MFA (SMS & app-based) and JWT token management, delivering secure and frictionless user access.
overview: This identity service centralizes access control with OAuth2, multi-factor authentication, and role-based permissions, ensuring secure sessions across all applications.

title: Digital Credit Product – End-to-End Lending
shortDesc: 100% digital credit flow delivered $12 M monthly placements with +8% funnel uplift.
subtitle: Seamless online credit journey from application to disbursement
challenge: Lack of a fully digital credit solution limited customer acquisition and caused high support volume.
solution: We launched a customer-centric digital credit product with responsive UI, guided application flow, real-time eligibility checks, and instant fund disbursement.
overview: This end-to-end product guides users through application, approval, and funding with minimal friction, maximizing conversion and user satisfaction.

title: Industrial Digital Transformation Initiative
shortDesc: Smart factory rollout boosted output by 15% and cut downtime by 30%.
subtitle: End-to-end smart factory platform for Industry 4.0
challenge: Legacy production lines suffered frequent unplanned stops, manual quality checks, and lacked real-time visibility into OEE.
solution: We deployed an end-to-end Industry 4.0 platform: networked sensors, edge gateways, a central MES dashboard and predictive analytics, enabling automated adjustments, real-time monitoring and remote operator alerts.
overview: This solution integrates IoT sensors on machines, edge-based data processing and a cloud-powered dashboard to transform factory performance in real time.

title: Agro-Industrial Robotics Platform
shortDesc: Autonomous harvesters increased yield by 20% and reduced labor costs by 40%.
subtitle: Automated field robotics for precision agriculture
challenge: Manual crop harvesting was time-intensive, inconsistent in quality and subject to labor shortages at peak season.
solution: We engineered an autonomous robotic harvester with computer vision, precision actuators and path-planning algorithms, enabling 24/7 operation, selective picking and adaptive row navigation.
overview: This platform combines on-board AI vision, GPS-guided navigation and wireless telemetry to fully automate crop harvesting with high precision.

title: IoT & Blockchain Traceability Solution
shortDesc: End-to-end product tracking achieved 100% compliance and cut losses by 18%.
subtitle: Secure supply-chain traceability with IoT sensors & distributed ledger
challenge: Lack of transparent provenance led to compliance gaps, counterfeit risk and inventory shrinkage across multiple distribution points.
solution: We implemented tamper-proof IoT tags on products, integrated gateway collectors and a blockchain ledger for immutable event logging, coupled with a consumer-facing verification app.
overview: This end-to-end solution tracks every unit from origin to shelf, using IoT sensors for live updates and blockchain for secure, auditable records.

title: Logistics Optimization with AI & Digital Twin
shortDesc: Route AI cut delivery times by 25% and reduced transport costs by 18%.
subtitle: AI-driven route planning & digital twin for fleet efficiency
challenge: Static route planning led to suboptimal delivery times, high fuel usage and inability to anticipate traffic or load changes.
solution: We built an AI-powered route optimizer coupled with a digital-twin simulation of the fleet, ingesting live traffic, weather and load data to generate optimal schedules and dynamic rerouting.
overview: This solution leverages machine-learning models and a digital twin to adapt logistics operations in real-time, maximizing efficiency and cutting costs.
